name: Egenius Go Up
author: Hassan Kibria

sections.description:
Egenius GoUp by http://webegenius.es

GoUp plugin lightweight plugin that creates a “Go to top” feature in your WordPress website.

2kb Scroll to Top jQuery plugin ;
Supports all major browser

Live preview ? Click here: http://plugins.webegenius.es/
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload plugin-directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. If you want to change image, then you can change it from in plugin directory to js folder . (line -no : 10)
sections.faq:
How do I install this plugin?

You can install as others regular wordpress plugin. No different way. Please see on installation tab.

short_description: This plugin will add Scroll to Top on your wordpress theme.
